value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
